verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Completely consume me, Lord. (echo)
Completely consume me, Lord. (echo)
I am the clay, You are the Potter.
I am the child, You are the Father.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
The only thing I want is to be
Captured and surrounded
by Your love.
O Lord, won't You consume me.
The only thing I need is to be
Captured and surrounded
by Your love.
O Lord, won't you consume me, completely.
